summary: This mod brings you Red Sonja as your follower. Two different look for you to choose, unique armor and ability.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WQabzvI.jpg[/img]


This mod brings you Red Sonja as your follower in Skyrim.

[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]About Red Sonja:[/size][/b][/color]

Race: Imperial
Weight: 100
Level: 6 to 100 level with player
Customised class: Amazon warrior
Location: Whiterun , Drunken Huntsman Inn

[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]Combat style:[/size][/b][/color]

She is a melee character, good with two hand weapon but lethal with one hand weapon dual wield. She is pretty decent with the bow too.
Spell: The only spells I gave her are healing spells to save you money buying her healing portions, not that she need any really but ...

The perks I gave her are aimed at one-handed weapon and light armor combat style. She also has magic resistance perk and light foot.

[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]Unique ability:[/size][/b][/color]

Red Sonja is a furious Amazon warrior woman, when enter combat she unleash her unique ability ( last 60 seconds ) that increase her speed, reduce damage taken and faster stamina regeneration. As combat progress, her blood heats up and when her health drops below 80 percent, her body gets so hot that can set nearby enemies on fire causing intense fire damage.

[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]Armor and weapon:[/size][/b][/color]

Armors and weapons are upgradable with glass smithing perk at any forge, and enchantable.




[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]Bodytype and look:[/size][/b][/color]

[u][size=4][b][color=#ead1dc]
Default Look: Hair tied up, red dress outfit, black chainmail armor
Comic book look: Hair down, red dress outfit, bikini armor.[/color][/b][/size][/u]


UNP / UNP HDT versionÂ  has a more battle worn look, with toned body and HD skin texture.
- UNP is standalone
- UNP HDT requires compatible skeleton and HDT

CBBE / CBBE HDT version has a more femine look with smooth fair skin.
- CBBE is standalone
- CBBE HDT requires compatible skeleton and HDT

7B Bombshell version has a muscle toned body but smooth skin texture. Oh and bigger boobs lol.
- 7B version requires compatible skeleton and TBBP

[u][color=#ead1dc]I have labeled the screenshots so it is easier for you to choose. The screenshots are taken without ENB, so you should get the same look in your game.[/color][/u]




[color=#ff00ff][b][size=6]Credit:[/size][/b][/color]
